'''Kindlejoy''', previously known as '''Pyro-1''', is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] that first appeared in [[Fabulous Fungus Frenzy]].

==Profile==
''(To be added.)''

===Appearance===
Kindlejoy is a [[Whirling Pyro Fungus]]. During combat in the event Fabulous Fungus Frenzy, like all Whirling Pyro Fungi, Kindlejoy appeared in its Scorched state.
